<?php
/**
 * 	Breadcrumb
 *
 */
class PhenotypeInclude_1103 extends PhenotypeInclude
{


	public $id = 1103;

	function display()
	{
		global $myDB;
		global $myRequest;
		global $myPage;
		global $myPT;
		global $mySmarty;


		$pag_id = $myPage->pag_id_mimikry;

		if ($myRequest->check("pag_id_mik"))
		{
			$pag_id = $myRequest->getI("pag_id_mik");
		}


		$myHelper = new PhenotypeNavigationHelper();

		$_pages = $myHelper->getPagesWithinPath($pag_id);

		// initialize smarty access, allocate $mySmarty and $TPL_XY placeholder
		eval ($this->initRendering());
		
		$mySmarty->assign("pages", $_pages);
		$mySmarty->display($TPL_1);

	}


}
?>
